title: param poruLE vaNakkam
sahitya:
param poruLE vaNakkam kIrtanAnjali nin bhakti suvaiyE maNakkum Om


anupallavi

  narambellAm un pugazh varambillA dishaikkum nAma japamE inda nAvinil inikkum


caraNam    kaN malar unnaiyE kaNDu kaNDu kaLikkum karuttellAm tanip-perum karuNaiyilE kuLikkum
paN malar maNamAlaiyAgap-parimaLikkum parama shuddhAnanda bhairavi shezhikkum
